body_html:
Hi all, thanks for your answers. I've searched for solutions before I posted the issue. So I've tried installing Cuda 9.0, I actually have file "libcublas.so.9.0" and I tried "export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64"

In the end, I solved the problem by :

reinstalling Cuda 9.0,
installing both tf 1.4,1.5 and 1.6 on the computer
and in the terminal, type: $ sudo gedit /etc/profile
Then, add these instructions at the end of the file:
export PATH=/usr/local/cuda-9.0/bin${PATH:+:${PATH}}
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64
${LD_LIBRARY_PATH:+:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}}

I followed instructions in this article: https://blog.csdn.net/QLULIBIN/article/details/78714596

Then, I rebooted the machine. Problem solved.

I'm not sure which step worked in this process though.

Thanks.
